files.patch:
@@ -6,4 +6,0 @@
-    - name: 'Check out repository'
-      uses: actions/checkout@v3
-      with:
-        fetch-depth: 1
@@ -16,0 +12,1 @@
+      shell: bash
@@ -21,0 +18,1 @@
+      shell: bash
@@ -27,0 +25,1 @@
+      shell: bash

@@ -16,0 +16,2 @@
+    - name: 'Check out repository'
+      uses: actions/checkout@v3
@@ -22,0 +24,2 @@
+    - name: 'Check out repository'
+      uses: actions/checkout@v3
@@ -31,0 +35,9 @@
+    - name: 'Install Cygwin'
+      uses: cygwin/cygwin-install-action@v2
+      with:
+        packages: >-
+          wget
+    - name: 'Configure Git'
+      run: git config --global core.autocrlf input
+    - name: 'Check out repository'
+      uses: actions/checkout@v3
